description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Crust Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cauliflower Crust Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toss chopped kale with lemon juice to make it tender. Spread passata evenly with the back of a spoon across the top of each base. Top bases evenly with kale, chicken and cheese. Return to oven for a further 10 minutes until the cheese is melted and starting to colour. Remove pizzas from oven and top with fresh basil leaves to serve.
